shows.title: The Frighteners
shows.desc:
Grab your crucifixes, pack the silver bullets and join the Sinister Minister Peter Laws on a celebratory romp through society’s morbid curiosities. Just why are we fascinated with the dark, spooky and downright repellent?

Baptist minister Peter Laws went from horror-obsessed church hater to God-fearing Christian and reconciled his love of the macabre with his faith.
